description:
Mirai, Shizuka, and Tsubasa have joined the MILLION STARS, but the 765PRO Live Theater that will serve as their home base is still under construction. While walking with the producer assigned to the project, the members of MILLION STARS show up one after another. Overwhelmed by their personalities, the girls immediately jump into their dance lessons. Even the touring members of the 765PRO ALL STARS learn the MILLION STARS have finally begun operating.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: きらめく世界! 私たちのシアター!
